result.eng: Máire, dear, what is wrong with you?
result.ga: A Mháire a stóir cad atá ort
result.orig: A Mháire a stóir cad atá ort
result.html: A Mháire a stóir cad atá ortMáire, dear, what is wrong with you?
result.ponchtml: A Ṁáire a stóir cad atá ortMáire, dear, what is wrong with you?

result.eng: And now, dear listeners, here is the news.
result.ga: Agus anois a lucht éisteachta seo chugainn an nuacht
result.orig: Agus anois a lucht éisteachta seo chugainn an nuacht
result.html: Agus anois a lucht éisteachta seo chugainn an nuachtAnd now, dear listeners, here is the news.
result.ponchtml: Agus anois a luċt éisteaċta seo ċugainn an nuaċtAnd now, dear listeners, here is the news.

result.eng: The Irish-language cause was very dear to my father.
result.ga: Ba mhór cúis na Gaeilge le m'athair
result.orig: Ba mhór cúis na Gaeilge le m'athair
result.html: Ba mhór cúis na Gaeilge le m'athairThe Irish-language cause was very dear to my father.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁór cúis na Gaeilge le m'aṫairThe Irish-language cause was very dear to my father.
